extension.description: RS Cool Mp3 Player is a flash based minimalistic Mp3 player with a twist, perfect for your website. It supports the basic functions of an mp3 player- play, pause, draggable volume bar, sound visualizer. It includes a special sound visualizer that changes when you drag the volume bar.

field.name: rsws_module_width
field.label: Module Width
field.description: Please specify the module width in pixel. (default value: 290)

field.name: rsws_module_margin
field.label: Margin between Player
field.description: If you are listing more than 1 songs, then please specify the gap between 2 songs. (default value: 10)

field.name: rsws_artistName
field.label: Name of Artist
field.description: Specify the name of artist. (Example: Artist A)

field.name: rsws_songName
field.label: Name of MP3 Song
field.description: Specify the name of mp3 song. (Example: Song A)

field.name: rsws_songURL
field.label: Location/URL of Song
field.description: Specify the name of song. (Example: http://www.song.com/mp3/song1.mp3)

field.name: rsws_width
field.label: Player Width
field.description: Please specify the Width of a single mp3 player button. (default value: 281)

field.name: rsws_height
field.label: Player Height
field.description: Please specify the Height of a single mp3 player button. (default value: 78)

field.name: rsws_artistFontSize
field.label: Artist Font Size
field.description: Font Size of the artist text in pixel (default value: 14)

field.name: rsws_songFontSize
field.label: Song Font Size
field.description: Font Size of the song text in pixel (default value: 12)

field.name: rsws_note1
field.label: SWFOBJECT Insertion: By default this is 'YES'. That means the module will add the required SWFOBJECT JavaScript library file. But if you think the SWFOBJECT is already inserted in your website (by your template or by any other component/module/plugin) then you can set it to 'NO' so it will prevent the double insertion of the same file.

field.name: rsws_note2
field.label: TROUBLESHOOTING: If this module works properly in your website, then this troubleshooting steps are totally not necessary for you. But if you notice some issue like 'Visualizer Wave is not showing properly' or similar, then choose 'Use Exact URL' to 'YES' and set the exact website URL below.

field.name: rsws_use_exact_url
field.label: Use Exact URL
field.description: Set to 'YES' to use the 'Exact URL', otherwise set to 'NO'. (Default: 'NO')

field.name: rsws_exact_url
field.label: Exact URL
field.description: The URL of your website, make sure it is properly formatted. (Example: http://www.yoursite.com/)

field.name: rsws_note3
field.label: Documentation:
field.description: To read documentation / step-by-step setup guide please Click Here.
